results.content:
Lovely experience, everything is clear and legible.
I recommend enrolling in this course anyone interested in app building and wants to work with simple HTML, API, JavaScript.
I hope this course will give you a different test and can be a good start if you don`t have any experience in this domain. If you are a pro, you can also take the course, who knows maybe it can provide you a different way of thinking.
